info.name: Whatcha-Doin APIs
info.description: API collection for the Whatcha-Doin application, generated by Gemini.

request.description: Endpoint for sending user feedback or bug reports. The message should be at least 10 characters long. Supported contact methods are 'email', 'whatsapp', 'link', or 'anonymous'. If not anonymous, contactDetail is required and validated based on the method.

query.description: The authorization code received from Supabase after a successful login attempt (e.g., from an email magic link).
The path to redirect the user to after successful authentication. Common values: '/', '/me', '/[username]'.

request.description: Handles the callback from Supabase after a user authenticates (e.g., via magic link). Exchanges the authorization code for a user session and redirects to the 'next' path.

variable.description: The base URL of your application (e.g., http://localhost:3000 for local development, or your deployed domain).
